name: test_12_6_0_pin_unpin_community_post
description:
Test that an admin user can pin and unpin selected posts.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Postpartum community page
4. Create a new post with image
5. Publish the post and verify creation
6. Pin the post
7. Unpin the post
8. Verify pin/unpin functionality works correctly
descriptionHtml:
Test that an admin user can pin and unpin selected posts.

Test Steps:

  1. Launch the browser
  2. Login as admin user
  3. Navigate to Postpartum community page
  4. Create a new post with image
  5. Publish the post and verify creation
  6. Pin the post
  7. Unpin the post
  8. Verify pin/unpin functionality works correctly

@allure.feature("12.0.0 CMS Communities")
    @allure.epic("Web CMS Testing")
    @allure.story("12.6.0 Pin/Unpin Community Posts")
    @allure.severity(allure.severity_level.NORMAL)
    @allure.description("""
    Test that an admin user can pin and unpin selected posts.
    
    Test Steps:
    1. Launch the browser
    2. Login as admin user
    3. Navigate to Postpartum community page
    4. Create a new post with image
    5. Publish the post and verify creation
    6. Pin the post
    7. Unpin the post
    8. Verify pin/unpin functionality works correctly
    """)
    def test_12_6_0_pin_unpin_community_post():
        with sync_playwright() as p:
            # Launch browser with larger viewport
            browser = p.chromium.launch(headless=False)
            page = browser.new_page(viewport={'width': 1920, 'height': 1080})
    
            # Login using the existing login class
            login_page = LoginPage(page)
            login_page.loginDev(admin_user, admin_pw)
    
            # Navigate to the Postpartum community page
            community_page = CommunityPage(page)
            community_page.go_to_postpartum_community()
    
            # Create a new post to test pinning and unpinning
            image_path = "uploads/images.jpeg"
            post_text = community_page.create_new_post(image_path)
    
            # Publish the post
            community_page.publish_post()
    
            # Verify post creation
            community_page.verify_post_created(post_text)
    
            # Pin the post
>           community_page.pin_post()
